{"step_by_step_thinking": "The soft palate is a part of the mouth that is made up of several components. According to Document [0], the soft palate consists of muscle fibers sheathed in mucous membrane. Document [1] also mentions that the soft palate is made up of five muscles, including the palatoglossus and palatopharyngeus. The uvula, as mentioned in Document [0] and [17], hangs from the end of the soft palate. Therefore, all the options A, B, and C are components of the soft palate.", "answer_choice": "D"}
